Action.author: mshamory
Action.body: It looks like sawtooth-block-info-tp was pushed to docker, but sawtooth-validator was also updated. Were those changes pushed to docker hub yet? I'm getting _ImportError: No module named 'sawtooth_block_info'_ with the latest validator image.

Action.author: rberg2
Action.body: Hello, I apologize for missing this last message. I have updated and pushed the sawtooth-validator image with the block-info package it was missing.
